}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "2976452700" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :Per the FCC operational description, this device is using RTL8811AU.
The USB ID used in this entry is per [[Edimax]]'s driver for the [[Edimax EW-7811UTC]]. {{see also|Delta Networks|Netgear A6200}} {{WiFiCert|WFA50272|11/25/2013}}
